definition: to behead (as form of capital punishment)/to chop
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
Life is short, learning is limitless/Ars longa, vita brevis
pinyin: ren2 sheng1 duan3 zan4 , xue2 shu4 wu2 ya2

definition: a lull (in the storm)/brief break (in rain)
deciduous tooth/milk tooth/baby tooth/also written 乳齒|乳齿[ru3 chi3]

sentences.english: The investigations were temporarily tabled due to more pressing business.
sentences.chinese: 由于有更紧急的任务，调查暂不进行。

sentences.english: The earthquake-hit regions will be exempt from the hike, the central bank said.
sentences.chinese: 央行还表示地震重灾区法人金融机构暂不涨价。

sentences.english: I think you may deposit your money with the bank or leave it here for temporary safe-keeping .
sentences.chinese: 我以为你可把钱存入银行，或留在银行暂保管起来。

sentences.english: We nominate it "the lateral orbital groove" and "the foramen for orbital branch of middle meningeal artery" respectively.
sentences.chinese: 暂分别命名为“眶外侧沟”和“脑膜中动脉眶支孔”。

sentences.english: Golden hill respect shows no-go to this matter of short duration comment.
sentences.chinese: 金山方面则表示对此事暂不方便评论。

sentences.english: Nankang officials said the new tax policy has been temporarily suspended.
sentences.chinese: 南康市官员说，新的税收政策暂不执行。

sentences.english: I thellonk you may deposit your money with the bank, or leave it here for temporary safe-keeping.
sentences.chinese: 我以为你可把钱存入银行，或留在银行暂保管起来。

sentences.english: No solely foreign-funded human resources intermediary service agency shall be established for the present time.
sentences.chinese: 暂不设立外商独资人才中介服务机构。

sentences.english: I can lie now there, may be sniff out a job when things quiet down.
sentences.chinese: 我可以在那暂避风头，事情平息后找个工作。

sentences.english: Return service temporarily set up shop, so please be cautious orders.
sentences.chinese: 本店暂不设置退换货服务，所以请谨慎下单。

sentences.english: The establishment of commercial enterprises wholly funded by foreigners is not allowed temporarily.
sentences.chinese: 暂不允许外商独资设立商业企业。

sentences.english: Unlike menopause, it is possible for POF to be temporary.
sentences.chinese: 不同于更年期，卵巢早衰很可能是一个暂时期。

sentences.english: Soon we were seeing whole villages that had been flattened.
sentences.chinese: 不多暂我们便瞅睹不少村庄整个夷为平地。

sentences.english: Smart phones started coming out in the nineteen-nineties.
sentences.chinese: 智能手机在1990年代开始暂露头角。

sentences.english: A temporary plugging agent comprising graded granules of salt that form a physical or hydraulic barrier.
sentences.chinese: 包含形成物理屏障或水力屏障的分级盐粒的暂堵剂。

sentences.english: I was a budding organization man.
sentences.chinese: 我成了一个暂露头角的组织者。

definition: this or that very day/in the next few days
in a little while/in a moment/later on
currently in short supply/in deficit (of commodity)/currently vacant (position)
to await a decision/to be pending
